The UC Irvine Experience
The UC Irvine Experience

HBIg Protocol During the anhepatic phase, 10,000 IU of HBIg was given intravenously (IV) followed by 10,000 IU of HBIg IV daily for 6 days Administration of HBIg was then changed to the intramuscular (IM) route and the frequency of doses was adjusted to maintain HBsAb titers above 150 IU/L Patients were evaluated on a monthly basis for the presence of HBV DNA and HBsAg until the HBsAb titers stabilized at therapeutic levels Thereafter, serology and HBsAb titers were checked every 2 months.
HBIg Protocol
During the anhepatic phase, 10,000 IU of HBIg was
given intravenously (IV) followed by 10,000 IU of
HBIg IV daily for 6 days
Administration of HBIg was then changed to the
intramuscular (IM) route and the frequency of doses
was adjusted to maintain HBsAb titers above
150 IU/L
Patients were evaluated on a monthly basis for the
presence of HBV DNA and HBsAg until the HBsAb
titers stabilized at therapeutic levels
Thereafter, serology and HBsAb titers were checked
every 2 months.
